org.sedml
Class Surface

java.lang.Object
  org.sedml.SEDBase
      org.sedml.Curve
          org.sedml.Surface

public final class Surface
extends Curve

Encapsulates the Surface element in SED-ML for representing an element of a 3-dimensional plot.

Constructor Detail

Surface

public Surface(String argId,
               String argName,
               boolean logX,
               boolean logY,
               boolean logZ,
               String xDataReference,
               String yDataReference,
               String zDataReference)
Parameters:
argId - A String identifier that is unique in this document.
argName - An optional String name
logX - boolean as to whether x-axis is a log scale.
logY - boolean as to whether y-axis is a log scale.
logZ - boolean as to whether y-axis is a log scale.
xDataReference - A String reference to the DataGenerator for the x-axis.
yDataReference - A String reference to the DataGenerator for the y-axis.
xDataReference - A String reference to the DataGenerator for the z-axis.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if any argument except name is null or empty.
Method Detail

getZDataReference

public final String getZDataReference()
Returns:
the reference to the DataGenerator for the z-axis

getLogZ

public boolean getLogZ()
Returns:
true if the z-axis is a log scale, false otherwise.
